basics.name: Brett Speaks
basics.label: Full-Stack Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Brett is a full-stack software engineer with 13+ years experience. He enjoys tinkering with the latest technologies
            and the challenge of solving very hard problems in creative ways. In his last job he dove in and re-wrote software that is
            handles over $60M/month in inventory. He enjoys working with dynamic languages better part of the last 5 years
            working with python, perl, bash, and Javascript, but he also has spent 10+ years working with Java and C#.

work.summary: D&S specializes in b2b asset recovery and management offering a technological focus not normally found in this business segment.
highlights: Primarly python, Javascript, and perl software development.
Managed software needs and day to day operations for our large portfolio clients, ex. Dell, Coke, ESAB NA, and Barns & Noble College.
Developed and maintained a b2b credit reporting and portfolio monitoring apps leveraging information provided by Experian and CreditSafe.
Developed VOIP phone, conference, and collection IVR systems using Plivo with graceful fallback to Twillio.
Developed and managed large voice and text blasting campaigns using Aculab Cloud and LiveVox.
Migrated entire company from ActiveDirectory to GSuite.
Managed migration of apps and databases from Texas and LA data centers to Google Cloud infrastructure with nightly deployments across 3 zones.
Managed migration of traditional app structure to Kubernetes with on-demand scaling.

work.summary:
Silpada was a home party jewelry sales company started by two women in their basement in Lenex, KS and
                grown to 45,000 representatives in the US, Canada and UK. While here I was a senior engineer dealing mostly
                with their custom customer service app built on the Netbeans platform and their middle tier business logic which
                was responsible for persistant order processing, benefit calculations, etc.
highlights: Java, Javascript, JSF, jQuery, JEE, Spring software development.
Principal on Silpada's e-comm site redesign. silpada.com/shop. Lead developer of social network integrations.
Development and maintenance of product and inventory management systems, and order and benefit calculation redesign.
Developed customizable mass emailing applications for repsresentatives.
Built and administrated JBoss application servers.

work.summary:
Lockheed Martin is one of the largest defense contractor in the US. While employed here, I was able
                to contribute to many of their projects in many different locations.
highlights: C++, C#, and Java software development.
Primary developer of Support Team Status status, Intel Management, and Global Message Processors - Nuclear Planning and Execution System (NPES), Omaha, NE
Developed General Query Tool using MicroStrategy and Oracle BI Discoverer. Lead prototyper of System Health and Status Tool using HP OpenView. - PASSGEAR - Denver, CO
Development of Multi-Level Mission Equipment ICDS and Master Equipment list. - Arerial Common Sensor (ACS) - Littleton, CO
Primary developer for spirals 0 and 1 of the Horizontal Releasability and Request tool. - HIRRT - King of Prussia, PA
